document.full_text: pakistan called on thursday for stern action against militants in afghanistan by afghan and u.s.-led foreign forces after 27 pakistani forces were killed in a cross-border attack by militants.
document.title: pakistan conveys concern to kabul after militant raid
lines_and_colors: pakistan called on thursday for stern action against militants in afghanistan by afghan and u.s.-led foreign forces after 27 pakistani forces were killed in a cross-border attack by militants.
